channel.title: computing on Tyler Webb
channel.description: Recent content in computing on Tyler Webb

item.title: Monitoring Websites with Ceres
item.description: Check out the Repo and Readme on GitHub: Ceres on GithubI built Ceres as part of my time with the Campus Web Services team at the University of Arizona to monitor our vast portfolio of sites.

item.title: Folding at Home and Rosetta
item.description: Folding at Home and Rosetta at Home are both distributed computing platforms organized and put together to provide researchers with an alternative high-compute platform.
